short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open and manage multiple Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides side-by-side in a single tab to boost your document workflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a way to boost productivity and manage your Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides more efficiently? 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗗𝗼𝗰𝘀 𝗦𝗽𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄 is the ultimate Chrome extension designed to revolutionize how you work. Say goodbye to endless tab switching and hello to seamless multitasking. With SplitView, you can open multiple documents side-by-side in a single browser tab, maximizing your productivity and minimizing distractions.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗗𝗼𝗰𝘀 𝗦𝗽𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄 𝗶𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗖𝗵𝗿𝗼𝗺𝗲 𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗗𝗼𝗰𝘂𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁:

𝗢𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗗𝗼𝗰𝘀, 𝗦𝗵𝗲𝗲𝘁𝘀, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝗹𝗶𝗱𝗲𝘀: SplitView allows you to open as many Google Docs, Sheets, or Slides as you need—side-by-side—within a single Chrome tab. You can choose between horizontal or vertical splits for ultimate flexibility.
𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗲 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲: Switch between fullscreen and split views effortlessly. Adjust the frame sizes to create a workspace that fits your needs perfectly, whether you’re analyzing data, writing reports, or designing presentations.
𝗦𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗗𝗼𝗰𝘂𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗴: With SplitView, you can quickly switch between all your open documents in a unified interface. Say goodbye to losing focus or hunting through tabs—everything you need is right there, just one click away.
𝗗𝗿𝗮𝗴-𝗮𝗻𝗱-𝗗𝗿𝗼𝗽 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗮𝗰𝗲: Organize your documents easily with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Rearrange your workspace with just a flick of the mouse—perfect for keeping your workflow efficient and clutter-free.
𝗨𝗻𝗹𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗗𝗼𝗰𝘂𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗙𝗿𝗮𝗺𝗲𝘀: Manage as many open document frames as you need without any limitations. Whether it’s 2, 3, or 10 documents, SplitView handles them all smoothly.
𝗗𝘆𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗰 𝗨𝗥𝗟 𝗦𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴: Share your entire workspace with a simple URL link. Your layout updates dynamically, so others can see exactly what you see—perfect for team collaboration and sharing document setups.
𝗗𝗮𝗿𝗸 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴: Protect your eyes and reduce strain with dark mode. Whether you’re working late or prefer a darker interface, SplitView offers a sleek, eye-friendly environment. Works with Google Docs, Sheets and Slides.
𝗦𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗯𝗮𝗿 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗤𝘂𝗶𝗰𝗸 𝗔𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗕𝗼𝗼𝗸𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸𝘀: Organize and save your most-used documents in folders within a handy bookmarks sidebar. Instantly access your important files without wasting time searching for them. Drag and drop folders and bookmarks for streamlined organization.
𝗦𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝗖𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗼𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗘𝗮𝘀𝗶𝗹𝘆: Share your vertical split-screen workspace with others, even if they don’t have the extension. Keep your team on the same page with seamless collaboration, no matter what tools they use.

𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗗𝗼𝗰𝘀 𝗦𝗽𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄 is ideal for professionals, writers, students, and anyone looking to enhance their productivity by managing multiple Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides more efficiently. With its easy-to-use features and customizable layout options, SplitView helps you stay organized and focused, making it the best Chrome extension for multitasking and document management.

Maximize your productivity today with 𝗚𝗼𝗼𝗴𝗹𝗲 𝗗𝗼𝗰𝘀 𝗦𝗽𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄—the must-have Chrome extension for anyone looking to streamline their workflow and get more done in less time. Download it now from the Chrome Web Store and experience the future of document management!
